summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Capital Raising (Placement)  
- **Total Capital Raised**: AUD 6.6 million (33,000,000 shares × AUD 0.20)  
- **Issue Price**: AUD 0.20 per share  
- **Proposed Issue Date**: 4 August 2025  
- **Use of Proceeds**: Strengthen balance sheet ahead of major game title launches  
- **Placement Structure**:  
  - 32,350,000 shares issued under 15% placement capacity (no shareholder approval required)  
  - 650,000 shares to directors, subject to shareholder approval at AGM (22 October 2025)  
- **Broker**: Canaccord Genuity (4% management fee, 2% selling fee)  
- **Key Condition**: Shareholder approval required for director allocations
